Articles.Content: I accidentally accepted a huge contract, and if I decline it I'll suffer a huge penalty. I've made big progress since my last save, so my only option is to edit the save file itself. Does anyone have any clue how to do this?

Or....I believe you can use the in game cheats menu to complete the contract.

If not, I'd need to poke around a save file, but it probably has something to do with changing a certain tag in the save file.
I figured it out. Thanks for the response nevertheless
Out of pure curiosity, what was the contract?
